Conventions

  • Bold text in procedures and descriptions
  • Italic text indicates cross-references and variables.
  • Monospace text indicates text displayed on screen.
  • Monospace bold text indicates text that the text is entered exactly as shown.

Notice and Safety Warning Icons

NOTE: Indicates important helpful information.
CAUTION: Proceed carefully to avoid damaging equipment or losing data.
WARNING: Proceed carefully to avoid injury.
Parent topic: About this Guide
